subject: Charges for conducting arbitral proceedings in Conference Room at NHAI;Dwarka.
text: HTd4 77c74 TrTHT yfadzut THN IPhone 91-11-25074100/25074200 976F # Tn; TTR) Y74 /Fax 91+11-25093507 25093514 (a Taat; H3F T# VR Extn = 2223 2318 2488 2553 Ttt National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 W6, #17-10, TTaT_ T6q-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-1+0075 No. 11041/21/2005-Admn: October 21,2005 POLICY CIRCULAR: ADMINISIRATIQNFFINANCE (108 /2005) (Approval _ 0n DR & QA Cell fie nio. NHAIIDR & QA CellfPayment2o05} Sub: Charges for   conducting arbitral proceedings in Conference Room at NHAI, Dwarka: As per the terms & conditions of the contract and the Arbitration & Conciliation Act; 1996 the cost and expenses of Arbitration proceedings are to be paid as determined by the Arbitral Tribunal. In almost all the arbitration cases going on in NHAI; the Arbitral Tribunal nonmally decides that till finalization of the Award, the cost and expenses will be shared equally by both the parties, wich include expenses towards venue and catering services etc." It has been decided tat an amount of Rs. 2500/- per may be charged towards venue: and catering services, when Arbitral proceedings are held at NHAI , Dwarka: These charges will be shared equally by both the parties till publication of Award; Alf concerned may please note for information and strict complance. This issues with the approval 0f the Chairman: )nI (G.P. Chand} General Manager (Admn ) To: 1. PS to Chairman 2, All Members CGMs IGMs 3. All PIUsICMUsISPVs 4, Librarian Hindi Officer NKA day
